author: joeyaiello
body:
The MSI currently pops a UAC prompt with the name "PowerShell Packages" because of the "Subject" set in the file properties. at sign-time:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1255187/33682270-ccadb5ea-da7b-11e7-9c05-c20964abd6ad.png)

That looks sketchy on the UAC prompt, so we should make it something like "PowerShell Core Installer" (or "PowerShell Core MSI"? )
title: Change "Subject" of the signed MSI to "PowerShell Core Installer"
